Come to the River.

Whether you want to visit the riverfront, host an event, or just ask a question, get in touch with the Partnership here or find a park ranger on your next visit.

Memphis River Parks Partnership
22 North Front Street, Suite 960
Memphis, TN 38103

info@memphisriverparks.org

It's a short, easy walk from downtown.

Explore the Parks

Host your next event at the river.

There are many options to host weddings, birthday parties, family reunions and more at the riverfront. We charge rental fees based on the impact to the park and to the public.

Get Started

Work with us!

It’s going to take all of us, together, to make the riverfront successful. Find out how to join the Partnership as a volunteer, ambassador or team member.
